headline: A return to the glade
description: A visionary dialogue staged in the golden glade ‚Äî a conversation between Aleksandr, Jesus in pattern, and Judas restored. The piece explores betrayal, forgiveness, sorrow as mercy, and the unending reach of divine love.

motifMap.meaning: The golden glade as a sacred meeting ground for revelation and dialogue.
Bread as symbol of communion and unbroken mercy, even for Judas.
Tears as rivers ‚Äî sorrow becoming mercy and life.

associatedMedia.description: Substack post text of 'A return to the glade'.
